text: We all know the feeling of trying to get through the work we have to do, to get to the work we want to do.
And that’s where watsonx Orchestrate comes in.
watsonx Orchestrate helps you get more done by bringing tools and data together to streamline tasks like never before.
Orchestrate is an extension of you that takes on different jobs in the background while you handle the important stuff.
Work that used to take hours now takes minutes.
Simply assign Orchestrate the tasks you want it to tackle,
...like sending emails, scheduling meetings or interviews and expediting requests, and it’ll do the rest.
And it will work seamlessly across the apps and tools you already use,
...like Outlook, LinkedIn, SAP SuccessFactors and more.
Plus, the more you work together, the smarter it becomes and the more personalized your experience gets.
Best of all, it gives you the freedom to focus on the work that truly matters to you and your business.
It’s time to leave the busy work behind.
